davinci.data.elem

Interface IElement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<IElement>, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEdge<N>, IVisualNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Edge, Element, VisualNode

    public interface IElement
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<IElement>
    This interface defines a single data element. Each element may has multiple
    attributes which can be treated as data dimensions. Two types of elements,
    INode and IEdge, are defined in DaVici. The elements will be stored and managed
    in a data structure which implements IData.
    Author:
    Nan Cao
    See Also:
    davinci.data.Element, Dimension, IData
